alt: Delta airplane cabin.

description: The image depicts the interior of an airplane cabin. The cabin is illuminated with a soft blue light, creating a calm atmosphere. The seats are arranged in a typical airplane configuration, with aisles running between them. The seats are upholstered in a dark fabric, possibly leather or a leather-like material, and are equipped with headrests and tray tables.  There are several passengers visible in the cabin. Some are seated, while others are standing or moving around. The passengers appear to be of various ages and genders, and they are dressed in a variety of clothing styles, suggesting a diverse group of travelers.  In the foreground, there is a flight attendant standing near the aisle. The attendant is wearing a dark uniform with a name tag, indicating their role in providing service to the passengers. The attendant is holding a tray with a beverage and a snack, which they are likely offering to the passengers.  The cabin is equipped with overhead compartments for storing carry-on luggage. The interior design includes overhead lighting and air conditioning vents, which are typical features of an airplane cabin. The overall impression is of a well-maintained and organized space designed for the comfort and safety of its passengers during their journey.

alt: Cat eyes.

The object in the center is a purple cat mask with a glittery texture, featuring a prominent nose hole and two eye holes. To the left of the purple mask is a black cat mask with a similar design, but without the glittery texture. To the right of the purple mask is a silver cat mask with a metallic finish, also with a nose hole and two eye holes. All three masks have a similar shape, with pointed ears and a triangular face outline. The image is a close-up photograph with a focus on the details of the masks.

alt: A sign displaying delayed flights.
article_heading: Passengers stranded after Newark Airport ‘radar issue’ results in over 450 flight delays 60 cancellations: ‘Unbelievable’
description: The image displays a digital flight information board with a blue background and white text. The board is divided into two columns, with the left column showing flight numbers and the right column showing flight status. The flight numbers are listed in a sequence, starting from 42 and ending with 41, with each number on a separate line. The flight status column indicates that all flights are delayed, with the word "Delay" followed by the time of the delay for each flight. The times are listed in 24-hour format, with the first delay at 4:55 PM and the last at 9:36 PM. The board is designed to provide passengers with real-time information about their flights.
